attributes.action: hold a UK referendum on independence for each UK country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hold a UK referendum on independence for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland and ending the constitutional debates in the individual puppet parliaments and assemblies along with the scaremongering tactics of current politicians.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
